title.narrative: Technical Assistance to Health Sector Development Programme (HSDP)

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance to Health Sector Development Programme (HSDP)) is a component of Health Sector Development Programme (HSDP) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £12,083,124. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Medical research. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank, Crown Agents Limited, Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 01-07-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
